programme.title: Kahaani 2
programme.desc: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh is a suspense thriller and spiritual successor to the acclaimed Kahaani. It stars Vidya Balan as Vidya Sinha/Durga Rani Singh, a woman whose daughter is kidnapped, leading to a series of events that unravel a dark and painful history. As the investigation progresses, hidden identities, shocking truths, and psychological tension come to the forefront. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, the film is packed with emotional depth, twists, and a compelling lead performance.

programme.title: Go Goa Gone
programme.desc: Three slackers attend a rave party on a secluded island in Goa, only to discover it's infested with zombies. With help from a Russian mafioso who claims to be a zombie hunter, they must escape alive in this hilarious genre-bending film.

programme.title: Kahaani 2
programme.desc: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh is a suspense thriller and spiritual successor to the acclaimed Kahaani. It stars Vidya Balan as Vidya Sinha/Durga Rani Singh, a woman whose daughter is kidnapped, leading to a series of events that unravel a dark and painful history. As the investigation progresses, hidden identities, shocking truths, and psychological tension come to the forefront. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, the film is packed with emotional depth, twists, and a compelling lead performance.

programme.title: Go Goa Gone
programme.desc: Three slackers attend a rave party on a secluded island in Goa, only to discover it's infested with zombies. With help from a Russian mafioso who claims to be a zombie hunter, they must escape alive in this hilarious genre-bending film.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this action-comedy features Govinda and Sanjay Dutt as conmen Tara and Sitara. Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.title: Kahaani 2
programme.desc: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh is a suspense thriller and spiritual successor to the acclaimed Kahaani. It stars Vidya Balan as Vidya Sinha/Durga Rani Singh, a woman whose daughter is kidnapped, leading to a series of events that unravel a dark and painful history. As the investigation progresses, hidden identities, shocking truths, and psychological tension come to the forefront. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, the film is packed with emotional depth, twists, and a compelling lead performance.

programme.title: Jodi No.1
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this comedy features Sanjay Dutt and Govinda as Jai and Veeru, partners in crime who flee to Goa and impersonate rich businessmen. Their plan to marry into wealth backfires hilariously as they fall for the daughters of their target, leading to a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Simmba follows the story of Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao, a corrupt and flamboyant police officer who enjoys the perks of his position until a personal tragedy forces him to rethink his choices. Transforming into a man of justice, Simmba takes on a powerful criminal nexus. With high-octane action, emotional drama, and punchy dialogues, this Rohit Shetty directorial stars Ranveer Singh and Sara Ali Khan in a thrilling narrative of redemption.

programme.title: City Lights
programme.desc: CityLights is a poignant drama that tells the story of Deepak Singh (Rajkummar Rao), a former army man who migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child after losing everything in Rajasthan. Hoping for a better future, he is instead confronted with harsh urban realitiesâ€”poverty, betrayal, and exploitation. Directed by Hansal Mehta, the film is a deeply emotional exploration of migration, survival, and the human cost of urban dreams. It is a remake of the acclaimed British film Metro Manila.
